sentence.Network_en: Liz saw their eyes meet fondly across the table.
sentence.Network_cn: 利兹看到他们隔着桌子深情对视。

sentence.Network_en: I had fondly imagined that riding a mule would be easy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我曾经天真地以为骑骡子很容易.

天真 - English translation - bab.la... ... 天真的人 naif 天真地 fondly 天真地说 prattle.
上述经文的另一些译本采用「热情地」（“fervently”）、「亲切地」（“fondly”）和「亲爱地」（“affectionately”）等字眼去描述基督徒 …

list.abs: over the years I fondly thought of him as my " valentine man " .多少年来，我天真地把他看作是我“最思念的人”。
i fondly imagined that you cared., 我天真地以为你很在乎呢.
fetch fervidly 充满激情地吸引fetch fondly 深情地吸引fetch gratefully 感激地吸引
pat or squeeze fondly or playfully , esp. under the chin ., 天真或开玩笑地特别是在下巴下面拍打或挤.

entry.def: If you are fond of someone, you feel affection for them.

example.ex: I am very fond of Michael...
She was especially fond of a little girl named Betsy.
example.tran: 她尤其偏爱一个名叫贝齐的小女孩。

entry.def: You use fond to describe people or their behaviour when they show affection.

example.ex: He gave him a fond smile.
example.tran: 他给了他一个深情的微笑。

entry.def: If you are fond of something, you like it or you like doing it very much.

example.ex: She is fond of collecting rare carpets.
example.tran: 她喜欢收集稀罕少见的地毯。

entry.def: If you have fond memories of someone or something, you remember them with pleasure.

example.ex: I have very fond memories of living in our village.
example.tran: 我对乡村生活有着十分美好的回忆。

entry.tran: (期望、愿望、信仰等)愚蠢的，不切实际的
entry.def: You use fond to describe hopes, wishes, or beliefs which you think are foolish because they seem unlikely to be fulfilled.

example.ex: My fond hope is that we will be ready by Christmastime.
example.tran: 我痴想着希望我们可以在圣诞假期前准备就绪。

auth_sentence.content: No wonder it is such a fondly-remembered release.
auth_sentence.res_content: No wonder it is such a fondly-remembered release.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No wonder it is such a fondly-remembered release.

auth_sentence.content: Fondly in his arms he took Fair Geraldine.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fondly in his arms he took Fair Geraldine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fondly in his arms he took Fair Geraldine.

auth_sentence.content: The owners confirmed Thursday that they still remember it fondly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The owners confirmed Thursday that they still remember it fondly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The owners confirmed Thursday that they still remember it fondly.

Sentence.sentence: Fondly enough, I don't like those kinds of films at all.

sentences.en: Taking Mary in his arms,he kissed her fondly.
sentences.cn: 他拥抱住玛丽,深情地吻她。

sentences.en: She is looking fondly at the plants he had nurtured.
sentences.cn: 她深情地看着他培育的植物。

sentences.en: The result was not what he fondly hoped.
sentences.cn: 结果并不像他天真地希望的那样。

sentences.en: I had fondly imagined that riding a mule would be easy.
sentences.cn: 我曾经天真地以为骑骡子很容易。
